title: 86/165/EEC: Commission Decision of 9 April 1986 approving a modification to the programme to improve the conditions under which fruit and vegetables are processed in the Netherlands in accordance with Council Regulation (EEC) No 355/77 (Only the Dutch text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 9 April 1986
approving a modification to the programme to improve the conditions under which fruit and vegetables are processed in the Netherlands in accordance with Council Regulation (EEC) No 355/77
(Only the Dutch text is authentic)
(86/165/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Pursuant to Regulation (EEC) No 355/77, the modification to the programme to improve the conditions under which fruit and vegetables are processed, communicated by the Government of the Netherlands on 20 February 1985 and supplemented on 14 May and 4 June 1985, is hereby approved.
This Decision is addressed to the Kingdom of the Netherlands.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 9 April 1986.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 51, 23. 2. 1977, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 130, 16. 5. 1985, p. 1.
(3) OJ No L 185, 18. 7. 1980, p. 42.
